param.name: package name
param.doc: The name of the settings package that is to be deleted. It can be retrieved by using the GET request.

method.name: DELETE
method.doc: To delete a settings package with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP DELETE request on the export import resource URI.

param.name: Content-Type:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service.
